Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Your Role

Responsibilities

As a Data Scientist, you will play a pivotal role in contributing to the development and implementation of AI models and algorithms to address complex business challenges. Your key responsibilities will include:


Taking ownership of data science initiatives and projects, demonstrating a proactive and results-driven approach.
Analyzing and interpreting complex datasets to extract meaningful insights and providing data-driven recommendations.
Collaborating seamlessly with multidisciplinary teams to comprehend business needs, designing, and implementing statistical models and machine learning algorithms.
Leveraging big data technologies and distributed computing frameworks for processing and analyzing large volumes of data, or equivalent cloud computing expertise.
Developing and deploying predictive models and algorithms in real-world production environments.
Conducting comprehensive exploratory data analysis, feature engineering, and model validation.
Effectively communicating findings and insights to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Embracing a data-driven, solution-oriented, and critical mindset, fostering teamwork and collaboration.


Your Profile


2 or more years of experience in data science roles with a focus on statistical modeling, machine learning, and predictive analytics.
Proficiency in programming languages, including SQL, Python, and distributed/cloud processing frameworks such as Pyspark.
Exhibit familiarity with advanced analytics libraries/frameworks such as Tensorflow, Keras, PyTorch, Scikit-learn.
Robust understanding of statistical analysis, hypothesis testing, and various machine learning techniques.
Hands-on experience with data visualization tools and libraries such as Seaborn, Matplotlib, or Plotly.
Proven ability to work with large datasets and experience in distributed computing frameworks, either on-premises or in the cloud.
Excellent communication skills, enabling effective collaboration within cross-functional teams.
Analytical mindset, attention to detail, and strong problem-solving skills for addressing complex data challenges.
Hold a solid academic foundation in a relevant discipline, such as Engineering, Data & AI, or Computer Sciences.
Familiarity with cloud platforms (Azure, GCP, AWS is a plus).
Mandatory fluency in English.


What You'll Love About Working


Join a multicultural and inclusive team environment.
Enjoy a supportive atmosphere promoting work-life balance.
Hybrid work.
Your career growth is central to our mission. Our array of career growth programs and diverse professionals are crafted to support you in exploring a world of opportunities.
Access valuable training and certifications in cutting-edge technologies.
Engage in exciting national and international projects.
Health and life insurance.
Referral program with bonuses for talent recommendations.
Great office locations.


About Capgemini

Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you‚Äôd like, where you‚Äôll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you‚Äôll be able to reimagine what‚Äôs possible. Join us and help the world‚Äôs leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
Decskill, founded in 2014 as an IT Consulting Company, places paramount importance on its greatest asset: its people. Our main mission is to deliver value through knowledge and talent, and we achieve this by fostering a culture of excellence and investing in the development and well-being of our people. With over 600 dedicated professionals and offices in Lisbon, Porto, Madrid, and Luxembourg, Decskill operates across three core areas:




DECSKILL TALENT: We believe that our people are key to our success. Through Decskill Talent, we empower our team to embrace the digital transformation challenges of our clients. We collaborate with clients to drive innovation, ensuring project success and business growth.




DECSKILL BOOST: Equipping our team with the latest tools and methodologies, we optimize Time-to-Market and deliver innovative solutions exceeding client expectations.




DECSKILL CONNECT: Our team collaborates closely with clients to implement and manage IT infrastructures that generate long-term value.




At Decskill, we believe that by nurturing and empowering our people to confront the challenges of digital transformation, we create value not only for our clients but also for our entire ecosystem, fostering a digital community dedicated to growth and progress.




We are looking for a Senior Data Scientist!




Tasks:

Develop and implement sophisticated machine learning models and algorithms to extract valuable insights from large, diverse data sets
Collaborate with business leaders to understand their data and analytics needs, and translate them into effective data science solutions
Mentor and guide junior data scientists, providing technical guidance and career development support
Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and advancements in data science, machine learning, and artificial intelligence, and recommend innovative approaches to enhance the company's analytical capabilities
Communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders, presenting findings and recommendations in a clear, compelling manner
Ensure data integrity, model accuracy, and overall quality of data science deliverables
Contribute to the development and enhancement of the company's data science infrastructure and tools




Requirements:

Data Visualization tools - Qlik Sense / Qlik View / PowerBI / Tableau
Strong understanding of design principles and ability to translate requirements into technical specifications
Minimum 5 years of of hands-on experience as a data scientist or in a similar role, preferably in a multinational, fast-paced environment
Experience leading and mentoring data science teams
Programming languages such as Python, R, or Scala, and experience working with big data technologies (e.g., Hadoop, Spark, Kafka)
Strong self management and problem-solving skills
Knowledge of data management (ETL) and Snowflake is preferred
Practical experience with agile methodologies
Excellent communication and teamwork skills
Fluency in English is mandatory




If you‚Äôre interested in this job please send your CV in english to vanessa.romao@decskill.com with reference ‚ÄúVR/DataScientist)‚Äù




Decskill is committed to equality and non-discrimination with all our talents. We recruit and promote talent, based on diversity and inclusion, regardless of age, gender, ethnicity, race, nationality or any other form of discrimination incompatible with the dignity of the human being.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Industry: Mobility Tech | Location: Lisbon, Portugal | Work Model: Hybrid

Start Date: ASAP | Seniority: Mid-Senior Level




Workster is proud to partner with one of the most innovative and fast-growing companies in the global mobility tech industry. With a strong focus on sustainable transportation and intelligent pricing strategies, our client is expanding its tech hub in Lisbon, and we‚Äôre now looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to join their advanced data science team.




This is a unique opportunity to work on cutting-edge ML solutions involving technologies at the core of dynamic pricing and optimization strategies used in real-time operations.




Your Key Responsibilities

Design, build, and maintain production-grade ML systems, particularly focused on reinforcement learning and bandit algorithms
Collaborate with cross-functional teams (Data Scientists, Engineers, Product Managers, Business Operations) to bring prototypes to life
Monitor system behavior and model performance through dashboards and custom visualizations
Proactively identify operational inefficiencies and develop ML-powered solutions to drive automation and performance
Communicate technical approaches and results to both technical and non-technical audiences




What You Bring

Solid experience in machine learning
Proficiency in Python and hands-on experience with frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch
Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS, GCP, or Azure
Experience deploying models in production environments with attention to performance, scalability, and monitoring
Fluent in English and eager to work in a multicultural, collaborative environment




The Offer

Attractive base salary (depending on experience)
28 vacation days per year + birthday + 1 volunteer day
Private health insurance
Access to Coverflex for meal, transport, tech, and wellness benefits
Learning & development budget (training, conferences, mentorship)
Hybrid work model, flexible hours, no dress code
Join a progressive company culture driven by innovation, ownership, and transparency




If you're passionate about applying machine learning to real-world problems, especially in a fast-paced and impactful industry like mobility, this is your chance to join a company where your work directly shapes smarter, more sustainable cities.




Interested? Apply, send your CV here or to paula.skalecka@workster.jobs

Title: Data Scientist Master
HTML:
Overview:

We are a Portuguese electricity distribution system operator, responsible for managing, operating, and maintaining the national electricity distribution network. It ensures a reliable and secure supply of electricity to millions of consumers across Portugal, while also promoting the integration of renewable energy and supporting the transition to a more sustainable energy system. We invest in digitalization, smart grids, and innovative technologies to improve efficiency, quality of service, and customer experience.


What will you do?

  • Support the implementation of AI initiatives, including data pipeline design, model deployment, and MLOps practices;
  • Develop and implement advanced analytical models (combinatorial models, deep learning on structured and unstructured data);
  • Conduct business requirements analysis and translate them into technical specifications for development teams;
  • Support the definition of AI strategies and their operationalization, in alignment with internal and external stakeholders;
  • Ensure the application of Responsible AI practices, including monitoring, regulatory compliance, and quality guidelines;
  • Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams (POs, Tech Leads, Data Engineers, Data Scientists, and business stakeholders);
  • Prepare and deliver documentation and management materials (QBRs, executive reports, presentations, steering committees, etc.).


What are we looking for?

  • Up to 15 years of experience as a Data Scientist or in a similar role;
  • Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Software Engineering, Computer Engineering, or a related field;
  • Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal;
  • Experience in developing AI systems, data pipelines, machine learning models, and MLOps practices;
  • Knowledge of Responsible AI, Data Governance, and regulations (GDPR);
  • Experience with relational and NoSQL databases;
  • Proficiency with machine learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, Caffe);
  • Experience in developing projects using programming languages such as Python, R, SAS;
  • Hands-on experience with cloud environments (MS Azure ‚Äì valued, AWS, GCP) and containerization solutions (Kubernetes, Docker);
  • Knowledge of Agile methodologies, JIRA, and Confluence (valued);
  • Fluency in Portuguese and English (written and spoken); Spanish is a plus.


What can you expect from us?

  • A permanent job contract for a long term project;
  • Tech equipment + SIM Card + personal smartphone;
  • Health and Life Insurance;
  • Social events and team buildings;
  • The commitment of letting you grow with us, and be rewarded accordingly;
  • A dynamic and young team that will be always there to support you;
  • Training in the latest technologies;
  • Coffee, fruits, snacks and a warm welcoming when you pass by the office.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
With just over 7 years of experience in the Portuguese market, we share our DNA with more than 200 workers and position our offer according to 3 lines of service:

Strategy (Outsourcing, NeXel, Team as a Service, Tech Academies);
R&D (Bootcamps, POC, Tech Lab);
Nearshore.




In ADENTIS, we focus on PEOPLE. This is our emotional salary:

Great Work-Life balance;
Very flexible organizational routine;
Health benefits (for you and your family);
Team Building activities;
Over 300 protocols to offer you great discounts in different areas;
Continuous professional development sponsored by our Training and Certification Department;
Regular feedback on your performance through a personalized plan;
Comprehensive career plan and progression involving assertive performance reviews.




Responsibilities:

Develop and implement machine learning models tailored to CRM and platform contexts.
Design and deploy models for retention use cases, anomaly detection, regression analysis, and other predictive analytics tasks.
Create and manage automated data pipelines for efficient data processing and model deployment.
Ensure seamless integration of machine learning models into existing systems and workflows.
Monitor data flows to ensure the quality, consistency, and reliability of data used for machine learning models.
Troubleshoot and resolve data-related issues promptly to maintain smooth operations.
Utilize Azure Databricks for data processing, model training, and deployment.
Optimize the use of Databricks resources to achieve efficient and cost-effective machine learning solutions.
Design and maintain the infrastructure required for machine learning projects, ensuring scalability and performance.
Collaborate with IT and DevOps teams to manage cloud resources and deployment environments.




You must have:

‚Ä¢ Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering, or a related field.

‚Ä¢ Proven experience as a Machine Learning Engineer or similar role, with a focus on CRM and platform-based solutions.

‚Ä¢ Strong proficiency in developing machine learning models, particularly for retention use cases, anomaly detection, and regression analysis.

‚Ä¢ Experience with pipeline automation and data flow monitoring.

‚Ä¢ Hands-on experience with Azure Databricks for data processing and machine learning tasks.

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with cloud infrastructure management, preferably within the Azure ecosystem.

‚Ä¢ Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or Scala, and experience with machine learning libraries and frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-Learn).

‚Ä¢ Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to work on complex data-driven projects.

‚Ä¢ Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment.

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with DevOps practices and tools is a plus.

‚Ä¢ Experience with CRM platforms and customer data analytics is an advantage.

‚Ä¢ European Union Citizenship or Portuguese Working Visa / Portuguese Residency.

‚Ä¢ Availability to go to the office, twice a week.

If you want to be part of a real People First organization, join us! Send your CV to andre.lago@adentis.pt

‚Ä¢ Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to work on complex data-driven projects.

‚Ä¢ Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment.

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with DevOps practices and tools is a plus.

‚Ä¢ Experience with CRM platforms and customer data analytics is an advantage.

‚Ä¢ European Union Citizenship or Portuguese Working Visa / Portuguese Residency.

‚Ä¢ Availability to go to the office, twice a week.

If you want to be part of a real People First organization, join us! Send your CV to andre.lago@adentis.pt

Title: Data Science Analyst
Description:
Who We Are

Metyis is a global and forward-thinking firm operating across a wide range of industries, developing and delivering AI & Data, Digital Commerce, Marketing & Design solutions and Advisory services. At Metyis, our long-term partnership model brings long-lasting impact and growth to our business partners and clients through extensive execution capabilities.

With our team, you can experience a collaborative environment with highly skilled multidisciplinary experts, where everyone has room to build bigger and bolder ideas. Being part of Metyis means you can speak your mind and be creative with your knowledge. Imagine the things you can achieve with a team that encourages you to be the best version of yourself.

We are Metyis. Partners for Impact.

What We Offer


A chance to grow your analytics skills in a supportive, international environment.
Direct exposure to real-world business challenges and data-driven strategy.
Mentorship from experienced data scientists and analysts.
Opportunities to evolve toward more advanced data science roles.
Dynamic and diverse team within one of the leading global fashion brands.
Become part of a fast-growing international and diverse team.



What you will do


Support data-driven decision-making by preparing and analyzing data related to customer behavior, CRM performance, and sales across multiple channels.
Work closely with data scientists and business stakeholders to translate business questions into meaningful insights.
Perform exploratory data analysis (EDA) to support data science model development.
Use Python and SQL to clean, process, and visualize data in support of analytics and modeling projects.
Apply basic statistical methods (e.g. descriptive statistics, correlation analysis, hypothesis testing) to uncover insights.
Ensure data quality and consistency across sources by collaborating with data engineering and IT teams.
Communicate findings clearly through presentations and storytelling.
Actively participate in sprint planning, reviews, and agile ceremonies within the team.



What you‚Äôll bring


1‚Äì2 years of experience in analytics, business intelligence, or a related data role (internships included).
Bachelor‚Äôs or master‚Äôs degree in a quantitative field such as Statistics, Economics, Business Analytics, or Engineering.
Experience working with data using SQL and Python (pandas, matplotlib/seaborn).
Experience with PySpark and Spark technologies is a strong plus, but not mandatory.
Basic understanding of statistics and its application in business analytics.
Strong attention to detail, curiosity, and eagerness to learn.
Good communication skills, including the ability to explain data insights to non-technical stakeholders.
Team player with a proactive mindset and willingness to grow in a collaborative environment.
Fluency in English (written and spoken)



Nice to have:


Exposure to cloud platforms like AWS, Azure or Databricks.
Knowledge of Python packages used in machine learning (e.g. scikit-learn).
Participation in academic or personal analytics projects



In a changing world, diversity and inclusion are core values for team well-being and performance. At Metyis, we want to welcome and retain all talents, regardless of gender, age, origin or sexual orientation, and irrespective of whether or not they are living with a disability, as each of them has their own experience and identity.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
We are looking for an experienced Data Scientist to join our team in Porto. In this role, you will leverage your expertise in data analysis, machine learning, and Python development to deliver insights that drive smarter business decisions and innovative solutions.




Key Responsibilities

Design, develop, and deploy data-driven models and machine learning solutions.
Perform data exploration, cleaning, and feature engineering to support predictive and analytical models.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams (engineering, product, business) to define data requirements and deliver actionable insights.
Develop scalable data pipelines and contribute to the improvement of existing data infrastructure.
Visualize and communicate complex data findings in a clear and compelling way.
Apply best practices in model validation, testing, and monitoring.




Requirements

5+ years of experience in Data Science or a related field.
Strong proficiency in Python and its data ecosystem (Pandas, Numpy, Scikit-learn, etc.).
Experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Matplotlib, Plotly, Power BI, or similar).
Solid understanding of statistical methods, machine learning techniques, and model evaluation.
Familiarity with SQL and data management.
Ability to work in a hybrid model (1x per week on-site in Porto).
Strong communication skills and the ability to translate data insights into business recommendations.




Nice to Have

Experience with deep learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch).
Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure).
Familiarity with MLOps practices and deployment of models into production.

Title: Data Science Associate
Description:
Who We Are

Metyis is a global and forward-thinking firm operating across a wide range of industries, developing and delivering AI & Data, Digital Commerce, Marketing & Design solutions and Advisory services. At Metyis, our long-term partnership model brings long-lasting impact and growth to our business partners and clients through extensive execution capabilities.

With our team, you can experience a collaborative environment with highly skilled multidisciplinary experts, where everyone has room to build bigger and bolder ideas. Being part of Metyis means you can speak your mind and be creative with your knowledge. Imagine the things you can achieve with a team that encourages you to be the best version of yourself.

We are Metyis. Partners for Impact.

What We Offer


A chance to grow your analytics skills in a supportive, international environment.
Direct exposure to real-world business challenges and data-driven strategy.
Mentorship from experienced data scientists and analysts.
Opportunities to evolve toward more advanced data science roles.
Dynamic and diverse team within one of the leading global fashion brands.
Become part of a fast-growing international and diverse team.



What you will do


Support data-driven decision-making by preparing and analyzing data related to customer behavior, CRM performance, and sales across multiple channels.
Work closely with data scientists and business stakeholders to translate business questions into meaningful insights.
Perform exploratory data analysis (EDA) to support data science model development.
Use Python and SQL to clean, process, and visualize data in support of analytics and modeling projects.
Apply basic statistical methods (e.g. descriptive statistics, correlation analysis, hypothesis testing) to uncover insights.
Ensure data quality and consistency across sources by collaborating with data engineering and IT teams.
Communicate findings clearly through presentations and storytelling.
Actively participate in sprint planning, reviews, and agile ceremonies within the team.



What you‚Äôll bring


3+ years of experience in analytics, business intelligence, or a related data role.
Bachelor‚Äôs or master‚Äôs degree in a quantitative field such as Statistics, Economics, Business Analytics, or Engineering.
Experience working with data using SQL and Python (pandas, matplotlib/seaborn).
Experience with PySpark and Spark technologies is a strong plus, but not mandatory.
Basic understanding of statistics and its application in business analytics.
Strong attention to detail, curiosity, and eagerness to learn.
Good communication skills, including the ability to explain data insights to non-technical stakeholders.
Team player with a proactive mindset and willingness to grow in a collaborative environment.
Fluency in English (written and spoken)



Nice to have:


Exposure to cloud platforms like AWS, Azure or Databricks.
Knowledge of Python packages used in machine learning (e.g. scikit-learn).



In a changing world, diversity and inclusion are core values for team well-being and performance. At Metyis, we want to welcome and retain all talents, regardless of gender, age, origin or sexual orientation, and irrespective of whether or not they are living with a disability, as each of them has their own experience and identity.

Title: AI Engineer - 100% Remote
Description:
Its not magic. Its artificial intelligence. And you could be the next wizard.

You know that moment when everything clicks and you realize youre ready for something bigger? This is that moment.

Position: AI Engineer (100% remote in Portugal)

So, what does it mean to be an AI Engineer here?

It means being at the forefront of innovation, turning real-world challenges into smart solutions. It means working with deep learning, NLP, computer vision, chatbots, and agentic AI platforms to reinvent how our clients operate.

What youll be doing (in epic fashion):


Develop AI solutions that actually work not just in theory, but in the real world.
Work with deep learning, NLP, TensorFlow, computer vision, chatbots, and agentic platforms.
Take part in multidisciplinary projects, from functional design to prototyping and testing.
Document solutions, share learnings, and contribute to our AI strategy.
Collaborate with internal teams to identify innovation opportunities using AI.



What you bring to the table:

Mandatory:


Minimum of 2 years of hands-on experience in AI solutions.
Strong command of Machine Learning, Deep Learning, TensorFlow, NLP, and related areas.
Solid understanding of algorithms, object-oriented design, and functional principles.
Experience in developing REST APIs, and designing NoSQL and relational databases.
English fluency is mandatory.



Valued:


Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science or a related field.
Experience with innovation accelerators.
Familiarity with cloud environments.



Why work with us:


Challenging projects with direct impact on our clients.
A collaborative, curious team with a spirit of innovation.
Hybrid and flexible work environment.
Competitive salary and benefits tailored to your needs.
Real opportunities for growth and development.



Were not looking for someone perfect. Were looking for someone real.

If youre an AI Engineer ready to be part of something thats changing the game, we want to talk to you.

Apply now and join the digital revolution.

Title: AI Developer
Description:
You'll be focused in


Collaborating with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into AI/ML solutions
Designing, developing and deploying AI models and algorithms for tasks such as classification, regression, clustering, and recommendation
Preprocess and analyze large datasets to extract meaningful features and insights for model training
Experiment with different machine learning techniques and algorithms to improve model performance and accuracy
Implement and optimize AI/ML models for scalability, efficiency, and real-time inference
Conducting rigorous testing and validation of AI models to ensure robustness, reliability, and generalization
Staying updated on the latest advancements in AI/ML research, frameworks, and tools, and evaluate their applicability to our projects


In order to succeed, you‚Äôll need


Bachelor's degree in computer science, software engineering, or comparable work experience
Proven experience working as a AI Developer or related role
Hands-on experience in building and deploying AI models and generative AI models in production environments
Experience in programming languages commonly used in AI/ML development, such as Python
Strong experience in machine learning algorithms, techniques, and frameworks, such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn
Experience with cloud platforms and related AI/ML services including generative AI technologies
Strong communication and analytical skills
Great English skills, both written and spoken


About The Product

Our Production Spoke is committed to delivering value through data in the production and logistics domain.

We focus on enabling the spoke in the design, implementation, and operationalization of impactful use cases by leveraging AI technologies.

Company Benefits


1200‚Ç¨ to equip your home office
720‚Ç¨ gross/year home allowance
Performance bonus
Health insurance extendable to your household
Wellbeing program extendable to your household
Life insurance
Pension fund
Smartphone & Unlimited phone data plan
Discounts on VW Group cars and special financing conditions
Relocation package & Visa process sponsorship (if applicable)


Cool Things You‚Äôll Experience In Our Work Environment


Tailored remote-friendly setup for every team's vibe!
Flexible working hours
Multicultural reality with + 30 different nationalities
Pet friendly environment
Boost your career with our internal mobility program, focused on your personal & professional growth
Mix and mingle across teams for idea-sharing and bonding


About VW Group Digital Solutions [Portugal]

Technology-driven trends such as diverse mobility, electrification and connectivity will revolutionize the mobility industry in the next decade. Volkswagen Group, as world leader in the automotive industry, is setting the pace for this revolution.

At Volkswagen Group Digital Solutions [Portugal] we are the go-to team to tackle complex systems and programming challenges. We make sure that our products flow smoothly in all stages of the digital value chain.

Our main areas of focus: vehicle software & operations, mobile online services, IT security, fleet management, sales & after sales, purchasing & logistics and product portfolio management.

-¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Apply fine-tuning and transfer learning techniques to adapt models to specific domains.

-¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Develop APIs and services to expose AI models in a scalable way.

-¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define requirements and deliver robust solutions.

¬†

Required Skills:

-¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Knowledge of fine-tuning, transfer learning, and advanced NLP techniques.

-¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Experience with LLM APIs (OpenAI, Azure OpenAI, HuggingFace).

-¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Experience with data engineering, preprocessing, and training pipelines.

-¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Knowledge of SQL and data ingestion.

¬†

Nice to Have:

-¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Experience with MLOps tools (MLflow, Kubeflow, Vertex AI, SageMaker).

-¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Familiarity with RAG, embeddings, and vector databases (Qdrant, Pinecone).

-¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Knowledge of Docker, CI/CD, and Git.

-¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†RESTful API development and scalable service integration.

-¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Data visualization skills.

-¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Experience with cloud platforms (Azure, AWS, GCP) for AI workloads.

Title: Data / ML Engineer
HTML:
Company Description

Continental develops pioneering technologies and services for sustainable and connected mobility of people and their goods. Founded in 1871, the technology company offers safe, efficient, intelligent and affordable solutions for vehicles, machines, traffic and transportation. In 2024, Continental generated sales of ‚Ç¨39.7 billion and currently employs around 190,000 people in 55 countries and markets.

Job Description

Are you a Data enthusiast who thrives on mastering technical challenges and pushing the boundaries of what's possible? At Continental R&D IT, we're a team of dedicated professionals who are deeply passionate about our work. We believe in creating innovative solutions while maintaining a collaborative and enjoyable work environment.

You will be part of a versatile team of data and analytics specialists that provides IT solutions to ensure and accelerate Continental‚Äôs internal digitalization. Contribute to our goals for reliable data solutions, based on excellent data integrity, availability, and quality through your support with operating and maintaining our modern, cloud-based data analytics landscape.

In this exciting job, you will work on the following tasks:

  • Design, develop, and maintain scalable data processing flows;
  • Support the development of new predictive models, establish automated AI/ML pipelines, and streamline the model lifecycle from training and validation to deployment;
  • Industrialize, further develop, and operate data and machine learning solutions to integrate them into Tire R&D processes and services;
  • Collaborate closely with Tire R&D experts and data scientists to understand business challenges and translate them into technical requirements.

Qualifications

  • Academic degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Data Science, or related field;
  • Advanced knowledge of data warehouses, data-driven use cases, and applications;
  • Proficiency in Python and SQL, with advanced skills in database technologies;
  • Familiarity with relevant machine learning libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn);
  • Hands-on experience with ETL processes or tools (e.g., Matillion, KNIME, Talend);
  • Experience with DevOps principles, Agile methodologies, and the software development lifecycle;
  • Professional working proficiency in English (written and spoken);
  • Excellent problem-solving and critical thinking skills;
  • Willingness to work independently;
  • Solution-oriented thinking.

Additional Information

  • Integration in a challenging and international work environment, featured by the existence of state-of-the-art technologies;
  • Flexible working model (hybrid);
  • Collaborative workstyle;
  • Continuous opportunities for personal development and learning.

We are committed to fostering a workplace where everyone feels safe, respected, and valued. All kind of applications are welcome.

Ready to drive with Continental? Take the first step and fill in the online application.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
HTML:
Expleo is a trusted partner for your innovation journey. As a global engineering, technology and consulting service provider, we are ideally positioned to help you achieve your ambitions and future-proof your business. With a smart blend of bold thinking and reliable execution, we‚Äôre able to fast-track innovation through each step of your value chain.

We are strategically positioned to build value, with a global footprint across 30 countries.

We are as global and local as you need us to be, with strong best-in-class pan-European technological centres and unique best-shoring capabilities.

We leverage a network of high value-adding affiliates in consulting and industrial excellence, and leading partners across multiple sectors to provide you with the most comprehensive services and solutions in an ever-changing environment.

Essential Skills

  • Minimum of 3 years of experience in the role;
  • Professional experience in Python and Machine Learning Frameworks (e.g., Scikit Learn, SparkML, PyTorch, Hugging Face);
  • Understanding and professional experience in Azure and Containerization (Docker, Kubernetes);
  • Strong knowledge of English and Portuguese.

Title: Python Developer
Description:
Your responsibilities




We‚Äôre looking for a Python Developer (F/M/D) with a passion for building robust back-end services to join our team and contribute to the development of our web-based product: the AI-powered CELUS Engineering Platform, which automates the electronics engineering process and significantly reduces development time. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Python development and a commitment to seamless user experiences. In this role you will:




Participate in the development of the back-end web applications and REST APIs, leveraging your existing web development experience.
Write efficient, readable, and maintainable Python code, embracing challenging tasks that extend beyond conventional Python API development.
Interact with a wide variety of tasks, from building APIs to coming up with clever business logic.
Interface and team up with other areas of engineering to solve diverse back-end problems, from third-party integrations to data modelling.




Your profile




3+ years of Python experience, including familiarity with Python web frameworks, preferably FastAPI, pydantic
Competence in using pytest and linters to ensure code quality
Knowledge of ORM on python and databases, MongoDB and SQL preferred
Ability to write highly legible code, using design patterns and generally accepted best practices
Knowledge of micro-service architecture is highly advantageous but not essential
Fluent in written and spoken English
Agile-mindset and solution driven way of thinking
Fluent in written and spoken English




We offer:

Shape the future

Have a direct impact on the electronics industry with our agile and international team.




Feel welcome

Enjoy our startup atmosphere and get to know the CELUS team at regular team events and our annual company offsite.




Lunch on us

Enjoy meal allowance, with a Coverflex card, which can be used in restaurants, supermarkets, food delivery services within the VISA network.




Stay healthy

Benefit from Private Health Insurance through the leading health insurance brand in Portugal, ensuring peace of mind for your well-being.




Learn and develop

Improve your skills with our learning platforms, English/Portuguese language classes, trainings and workshops.




Decide where and when you work

Enjoy hybrid office environment with home office allowance, flexible working schedule, ‚Äúworkation‚Äù program, 24 vacation days plus additional paid Christmas week holiday.




ABOUT US

CELUS simplifies and accelerates the electronics design process for the global engineering community with it‚Äôs AI-powered CELUS Design Platform.




We are a Munich founded start-up on a mission to unleash scalable engineering by providing a comprehensive library of electronics components and CUBOs, automating all the manual and tedious tasks in the design process, so engineers can spend more time on innovation.




Join our community of tech enthusiasts and proactive high performers in an amazing journey through the world of electronics. We work with a clear vision, empowered by an ambitious, fast-paced environment and caring atmosphere, where your ideas and contributions are highly valued. We have offices in Munich, Germany; and Porto, Portugal; and Austin, Texas, USA.




Embracing diversity is a very important value at CELUS. As an equal opportunity employer, we do not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, sex, age, national origin, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression.

Title: AI Engineer (LLMs/GenAI)
Description:
Were a tech consulting boutique based in Lisbon, helping regulated and high-impact companies ship real AI into production. If you enjoy turning messy business problems into crisp AI products assistants, document intelligence, computer vision, smart automations this is for you.

What You'll Do


Partner with clients to spot high-value AI opportunities and frame problems with measurable ROI.
Design and ship end-to-end solutions: discovery prototyping evaluation hardening production monitoring.
Build with todays stack: LLMs, RAG pipelines, vector databases, prompt engineering, function/tool calling, evaluation frameworks, guardrails.
Own the engineering bits: APIs, data pipelines, CI/CD, observability, cost/perf tuning, and documentation of architecture & lessons learned.
Champion responsible AI practices: privacy-by-design, bias testing, reproducibility, and clear model/product telemetry.



You have


3+ years building ML/AI in production (mid to senior).
Strong Python or TypeScript; solid algorithms and software design (OO/functional).
Hands-on with ML/Deep Learning and NLP = Natural Language Processing (transformers/embeddings), plus experience with REST APIs, NoSQL and RDBMS.
Comfort with a major cloud (Azure/AWS/GCP) and containerization.
Bonus: RAG at scale, vector stores (Pinecone/pgvector/FAISS), LangChain/LlamaIndex, OpenAI/Azure OpenAI, Triton/ONNX, feature stores, MLflow, K8s, Databricks, Vertex/Azure ML.



Why Nimber


Build useful AI that ships: real users, real impact, real telemetry.
Small senior teams, low bureaucracy, high ownership.



The process


Quick intro chat 2) Technical working session (no gotchas, real use-case) 3) Culture/values chat 4) Offer.



Sound like your kind of challenge?

Send your CV and GitHub to geral@nimber.pt

Title: Freelance Annotator (Portuguese) - AI Trainer
Description:
At Toloka, we connect smart, curious people from around the world with freelance online tasks that train and improve artificial intelligence.

What We Do

The Toloka Annotators connects individuals with Generative AI projects from leading tech innovators. Our mission is to unlock the full potential of AI by involving real people from around the world in the development process.

About The Role

Annotation is what helps AI make sense of the world. As an annotator, you may be invited to take part in online projects such as rating AI-generated content, evaluating factual accuracy, or comparing responses - when projects are available.

Responsibilities:


Carefully review provided data (text, images, or videos)
Label or classify content based on project guidelines
Identify and flag factually incorrect, sensitive, inappropriate, or unclear material


Important note: This is project-based work. Tasks are available only when projects are active. You may be invited to one or more projects depending on your profile and current opportunities.

Requirements


Bachelor's degree in any discipline
Minimum 1 year of experience in any professional role
You have advanced proficiency in Portuguese (C1) and a B2 level of English, both written and spoken
Logical thinking, fact-checking and reasoning abilities
Strong attention to detail and ability to understand and follow complex instructions
Strong communication skills, including the ability to ask clarifying questions when needed
Genuine interest in technology and artificial intelligence


Benefits

Why this freelance opportunity might be a great fit for you?


Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that fits around your primary professional or academic commitments
Work on advanced AI projects and gain valuable experience that enhances your portfolio
Influence how future AI models understand and communicate in your field of expertise

Description:
We‚Äôre looking for the special, unique and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, team work.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!

The amazing you, will have:

Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Technology, or similar;
Minimum 3 years of professional experience as a python Developer;
Solid knowledge of Python, Sphinx, Helm, GitHub, Azure cloud resources, Docker
Professional experience with Python Web Frameworks (Django, Flask, FastAPI)
Experience with Front-End frameworks (React or Angular, HTML, CSS,..)
Fluency in the English language (mandatory) and portuguese;
Availability for a hybrid regime at Porto or Lisbon (Portugal);










Why should you become part of our family?

You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term
Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity

Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto, Leiria and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the ‚ÄúIndex of Excellence‚Äù, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

Title: Python Developer
Description:
Make an impact by working for sectors where technology is the enabler, everything is ground-breaking and there‚Äôs a constant need to be innovative.

Create and enhance projects in Java, Pyhton, Angular, PHP, .NET and so much more while diving in the world of Blockchain, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, Security and Internet of Things.

Be part of the team that combines business knowledge, technological edge and a design experience. Our different backgrounds and know-how are key in developing solutions and experiences for digital clients.

Face challenges and learn other ways of thinking and seeing the world - there‚Äôs always room for your energy and creativity.

About The Role

We are looking for a Python developer with at least 3 years of experience to integrate a multidisciplinary team working on a project in the telecom market.

As a part of your job, you will:


Capture and understand the requirements necessary to implement customer needs.
Clarify scope, identify assumptions, requirements, and dependencies to ensure project alignment among all stakeholders.
Design, develop, and maintain scalable and efficient Python-based solutions.
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code.
Participate in code reviews and promote best practices in software development.
Collaborate with DevOps and QA teams to ensure smooth deployment and testing processes.
Engage in Agile ceremonies (e.g., daily stand-ups, sprint planning, retrospectives).
Communicate effectively with the client to gather requirements, provide updates, and clarify technical details.



What are we looking for?


Proficiency in Python ‚Äì Strong understanding of Python syntax, data structures, and object-oriented programming (3+ years of experience).
API Development and Integration.
Database Integration ‚Äì Familiarity with relational databases such as MySQL and PostgreSQL.
Version Control ‚Äì Experience using GitHub for version control and collaboration.
Testing and Debugging ‚Äì Knowledge of automated testing, integration testing, and debugging tools.
CI/CD Pipelines ‚Äì Understanding of continuous integration and deployment practices.
Cloud Platforms ‚Äì Hands-on experience with platforms such as Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and Amazon Web Services (AWS).
Containerization ‚Äì Experience with container technologies such as Docker.
Data Handling ‚Äì Experience in data manipulation using libraries like Pandas.



Personal traits


Education - Master/bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related field.
Strong Communication Skills ‚Äì Ability to communicate clearly and effectively in English.
Team Collaboration ‚Äì Comfortable working in large, cross-functional teams.
Adaptability - Ability to quickly learn new tools and technologies, and adapt to changing requirements.
Time Management ‚Äì Capable of managing multiple tasks and meeting deadlines.
Travel ‚Äì Availability to travel occasionally, depending on project needs.



At Celfocus, we are committed to cultivate a diverse and inclusive workplace. As an equal-opportunity employer, we welcome applicants of all backgrounds, gender identities, and abilities. We are dedicated to providing reasonable accommodations for candidates with specific needs. If you require any adjustments during the selection process, please inform our Talent Acquisition Team.

Come join the Team!

As a highly specialised engineering company, Celfocus helps clients undergo their innovation path, providing technological solutions to extract value from data and make it actionable.

Serving clients in +25 countries, Celfocus delivers solutions that boost customer experience and enhance operational efficiency, via our Cognitive Automation, Data & Analytics and Digital offers.

HTML:
Make an impact by working for sectors where technology is the enabler, everything is ground-breaking and there‚Äôs a constant need to be innovative.

Create and enhance projects in Java, Pyhton, Angular, PHP, .NET and so much more while diving in the world of Blockchain, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, Security and Internet of Things.

Be part of the team that combines business knowledge, technological edge and a design experience. Our different backgrounds and know-how are key in developing solutions and experiences for digital clients.

Face challenges and learn other ways of thinking and seeing the world - there‚Äôs always room for your energy and creativity.

About The Role

We are looking for a Python developer with at least 3 years of experience to integrate a multidisciplinary team working on a project in the telecom market.

As a part of your job, you will:

  • Capture and understand the requirements necessary to implement customer needs.
  • Clarify scope, identify assumptions, requirements, and dependencies to ensure project alignment among all stakeholders.
  • Design, develop, and maintain scalable and efficient Python-based solutions.
  • Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code.
  • Participate in code reviews and promote best practices in software development.
  • Collaborate with DevOps and QA teams to ensure smooth deployment and testing processes.
  • Engage in Agile ceremonies (e.g., daily stand-ups, sprint planning, retrospectives).
  • Communicate effectively with the client to gather requirements, provide updates, and clarify technical details.


What are we looking for?

  • Proficiency in Python ‚Äì Strong understanding of Python syntax, data structures, and object-oriented programming (3+ years of experience).
  • API Development and Integration.
  • Database Integration ‚Äì Familiarity with relational databases such as MySQL and PostgreSQL.
  • Version Control ‚Äì Experience using GitHub for version control and collaboration.
  • Testing and Debugging ‚Äì Knowledge of automated testing, integration testing, and debugging tools.
  • CI/CD Pipelines ‚Äì Understanding of continuous integration and deployment practices.
  • Cloud Platforms ‚Äì Hands-on experience with platforms such as Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and Amazon Web Services (AWS).
  • Containerization ‚Äì Experience with container technologies such as Docker.
  • Data Handling ‚Äì Experience in data manipulation using libraries like Pandas.


Personal traits

  • Education - Master/bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related field.
  • Strong Communication Skills ‚Äì Ability to communicate clearly and effectively in English.
  • Team Collaboration ‚Äì Comfortable working in large, cross-functional teams.
  • Adaptability - Ability to quickly learn new tools and technologies, and adapt to changing requirements.
  • Time Management ‚Äì Capable of managing multiple tasks and meeting deadlines.
  • Travel ‚Äì Availability to travel occasionally, depending on project needs.


At Celfocus, we are committed to cultivate a diverse and inclusive workplace. As an equal-opportunity employer, we welcome applicants of all backgrounds, gender identities, and abilities. Title: Computer Vision Engineer
Description:
Our client combines a passion for football with the power of data and is recruiting a Computer Vision Engineer. This person will be responsible for developing, optimizing, and deploying multi-object tracking pipelines to analyze football matches. Your work will have a direct impact on player tracking, tactical insights, and scouting solutions.

Responsabilities:


Computer Vision & Deep Learning: Develop and refine multi-object tracking models to detect and track players & the ball in football matches
Model Training & Optimization: Train and fine-tune deep learning models cost-effective and high-accuracy tracking
MLOps & Deployment: Deploy and maintain computer vision models in a cloud environment (Azure, Databricks, MLFlow)
Research & Innovation: Stay up to date with the latest advancements in deep learning, object detection, and tracking
Collaboration: Work closely with data scientists, engineers, and football experts to integrate tracking solutions into our products


Requirements


3+ years of experience in Computer Vision, Deep Learning, or a related field
Strong knowledge of multi-object tracking, object detection, and image processing
Proficiency in Python and deep learning frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, or OpenCV
Experience working with Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs), Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs), and Transformer-based vision models
Ability to work independently and in a fast-paced, dynamic environment
Hands-on, pragmatic problem-solving approach with a focus on real-world applications
Excellent English verbal and writing skills (C1-level)

Title: Python Developer
HTML:
Dellent is a consulting company focused in System Information and Telecommunications. Our goal is to help our candidates and consultants to take a step forward in their careers through projects that meet their needs and expectations.

This project is part of the business investment banking and financial services area, and currently has its technological hub in Porto and is working on the development of innovative solutions and support for all operations related to the business.

We are looking for a Python Developer to work in this project in Porto (Hybrid).

You Must Have

  • More than 6 years working with Python;
  • Strong SQL skills with experience in database management;
  • Basic knowledge of the Linux command line;
  • Knowledge and practice of DevOps (bitbucket, Jenkins, Sonar, XLDeploy);
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail;
  • Understanding of software engineering principles, design patterns, and best practices;
  • Excellent communication skills;
  • Excellent problem-solving skills;
  • Fluent in English (B2);
  • Knowledge of French is highly valued (but‚ÄØnot‚ÄØmandatory).

What can you expect from us?

  • Health insurance;
  • A personalized training plan, with a budget to spend on the training and technical books you find necessary;
  • Constant feedback so you can grow professionally;
  • Remote onboarding process;
  • Team events every semester so you can live new adventures;
  • Culture of proximity and transparency. Your ideas and needs are heard and valued by us!

Apply

If the above sounds like the kind of job opportunity you would want to get involved with, then please do not hesitate to apply here. You can also explore our content about the job market here.

Title: Python Developer
Description:
Decskill, founded in 2014 as an IT Consulting Company, places paramount importance on its greatest asset: its people. Our main mission is to deliver value through knowledge and talent, and we achieve this by fostering a culture of excellence and investing in the development and well-being of our people. With over 600 dedicated professionals and offices in Lisbon, Porto, Madrid, and Luxembourg, Decskill operates across three core areas:




DECSKILL TALENT: We believe that our people are key to our success. Through Decskill Talent, we empower our team to embrace the digital transformation challenges of our clients. We collaborate with clients to drive innovation, ensuring project success and business growth.
DECSKILL BOOST: Equipping our team with the latest tools and methodologies, we optimize Time-to-Market and deliver innovative solutions exceeding client expectations.
DECSKILL CONNECT: Our team collaborates closely with clients to implement and manage IT infrastructures that generate long-term value.




At Decskill, we believe that by nurturing and empowering our people to confront the challenges of digital transformation, we create value not only for our clients but also for our entire ecosystem, fostering a digital community dedicated to growth and progress.




We are searching for a Python Developer!




Responsibilities:

Primary goal will be to continually improve the core framework used for data integration and calculation of Market and Counterparty Risk Metrics.
Innovation is a key element of Risk Systems, so candidates will have the opportunity to collaborate in cross-team innovative projects and propose initiatives aligned with our top innovation priorities.
Develop and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable Python code.
Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to these problems.
Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the applications.
Ensure code documentation and organization.
Incrementally deliver applications to meet dynamic customer requirements.
Resolve incidents in a production environment.
Collaborate with different stakeholders in the solution of problems and blockages.




Requirements:

Experience with Python.
Experience with SQL and any industry standard relational database.
Demonstrable ability to write clean and readable code
Solid understanding of both object-oriented and functional programming paradigms
Understanding fundamental design principles behind a scalable application
English required, both spoken and written.




If you‚Äôre interested in this job, please send your CV to cesaltina.abreu@decskill.com or career@decskill.com with reference ‚ÄúPython‚Äù.




Thank You! üòä




Decskill is committed to equality and non-discrimination with all our talents. We recruit and promote talent, based on diversity and inclusion, regardless of age, gender, ethnicity, race, nationality or any other form of discrimination incompatible with the dignity of the human being

Title: Python Developer for Analytics ‚Äì All Genders - Fluent in English - Porto ‚Äì Permanent Contract ‚Äì Hybrid
Description:
Python Developer ‚Äì Fluent in English ‚Äì All Genders ‚Äì Porto ‚Äì Permanent Contract ‚Äì Hybrid

Join us at BNP Paribas Cardif, the Insurer for a Changing World.

At BNP Paribas Cardif, we're not just an insurance provider; we're pioneers shaping the future of the industry. As the global leader in the insurance market, with a significant presence in savings and protection insurance across 30+ countries all over the globe, we're committed to innovation and excellence.

At our European Service Center - Cardif Support, based in both Porto and Lisbon, Portugal, we're a vibrant hub of over 600 multicultural professionals speaking more than 11 languages!

Our goal? To deliver the highest level of service, reliability, and efficiency to our clients, both internal and external, by offering diverse processes and services aligned with the insurance industry's best practices.

Ready to kick off your next professional chapter with us?

Become our new Python Developer for Finance Analytics based in Porto

Be part of our dynamic ‚ÄúDonn√©es FAR‚Äù (Finance, Actuary, and Risk Data) Department, who is in charge of providing data to 3 main departments of the company : Finance, Actuary and Risk.

YOUR FUTURE MISSION IN THE ‚ÄúDONNEES FAR‚Äù TEAM

You will participate in maintenance and development of a key Python-based tool. This tool extracts data from our accounts-management representative reporting, then transforms data to fit our format and needs, check it, and then store it in our database.

Your Key Responsibilities Will Be


Ensure maintenance of the Python-based asset and guarantee that every reporting from out accounts-management representative can be loaded
Participate in the development of new features for the tool
Participate in the development of new template in the tool to extract data from new business or new accounts-management representative
Participate in the development of new reporting in Microsoft PowerBI based on data from the python tool
Be a force of proposal in the optimization of the Python tool and technical framework


READY TO MAKE AN IMPACT? HERE‚ÄôS WHAT WE‚ÄôRE LOOKING FOR:


Degree in Data Analysis, Data Engineering or any Python related fields
Minimum of 2-5 years of experience in data analytics or as a Python Developer.
Python full stack development experience, using libraries such as Pandas and Tkinter
Knowledge of finance or accounting data and/or concepts would be beneficial
Experience with PowerBI and SQL would be highly valued
Fluent in English with fluency in French being a big plus


WHAT‚ÄôS IN IT FOR YOU?

In addition to our attractive salary, here‚Äôs a glimpse of what you can expect from us:


Generous Perks: Enjoy meal, child and monthly flexible benefits allowances as part of our comprehensive benefits package.
Comprehensive Coverage: Rest easy with our top-notch insurance package (health, life, and travel), applicable to your spouse and descendants.
Flexibility Redefined: Embrace our hybrid working model for a perfect balance of commitment and personal flexibility.
Endless and tailored Professional Growth: Fuel your career aspirations with continuous development opportunities on both local and global scales
Vibrant Work Environment: Immerse yourself in our modern amenities, including zen rooms, free language courses, and diverse company events.
Culture of Care: Be part of a multicultural environment that prioritizes employee wellbeing and professional growth.


DIVERSITY AND INCLUSION ARE IMPORTANT TO US!

BNP Paribas Cardif is an equal opportunity employer and proud to provide equal employment opportunity to all job seekers. We are actively committed to ensuring that no individual is discriminated against on the grounds of age, disability, gender reassignment, marriage or civil partnership status, pregnancy and maternity/paternity, race, religion or belief, sex or sexual orientation. Equity and diversity are at the core of our recruitment policy because we believe that they foster creativity and efficiency, which in turn increase performance and productivity. We strive to reflect the society we live in, while keeping with the image of our clients.

CAN WE COUNT ON YOU?

If you're ready to shape the future of insurance and your profile aligns with our vision, send us your application with CV, cover letter, and Certificate of Studies. We look forward to welcoming you to our team!

Note: Only complete applications with all the required documentation will be considered.

  • Fluent in English with fluency in French being a big plus

WHAT‚ÄôS IN IT FOR YOU?

In addition to our attractive salary, here‚Äôs a glimpse of what you can expect from us:

  • Generous Perks: Enjoy meal, child and monthly flexible benefits allowances as part of our comprehensive benefits package.
  • Comprehensive Coverage: Rest easy with our top-notch insurance package (health, life, and travel), applicable to your spouse and descendants.
  • Flexibility Redefined: Embrace our hybrid working model for a perfect balance of commitment and personal flexibility.
  • Endless and tailored Professional Growth: Fuel your career aspirations with continuous development opportunities on both local and global scales
  • Vibrant Work Environment: Immerse yourself in our modern amenities, including zen rooms, free language courses, and diverse company events.
  • Culture of Care: Be part of a multicultural environment that prioritizes employee wellbeing and professional growth.

DIVERSITY AND INCLUSION ARE IMPORTANT TO US!

BNP Paribas Cardif is an equal opportunity employer and proud to provide equal employment opportunity to all job seekers. We are actively committed to ensuring that no individual is discriminated against on the grounds of age, disability, gender reassignment, marriage or civil partnership status, pregnancy and maternity/paternity, race, religion or belief, sex or sexual orientation. Equity and diversity are at the core of our recruitment policy because we believe that they foster creativity and efficiency, which in turn increase performance and productivity. We strive to reflect the society we live in, while keeping with the image of our clients.

CAN WE COUNT ON YOU?

If you're ready to shape the future of insurance and your profile aligns with our vision, send us your application with CV, cover letter, and Certificate of Studies. We look forward to welcoming you to our team!

Note: Only complete applications with all the required documentation will be considered.

Title: Robotics R&D Engineer
Description:
SARKKIS Robotics is a robotics company, integrated in the AGT Robotics Group (Canada). Our mission is the development of the most advanced welding robotic systems in the world, through the combination of robotics, machine vision, advanced path planning and artificial intelligence.

SARKKIS Robotics headquarters are in Porto University District, with the R&D industrial laboratory located in Santa Maria da Feira.




Role Description

This is a full-time role integrated on the development of AGT labs team that is responsible for the development of the future products of the company. As an R&D Engineer you might deal with a wide variety of technologies, including industrial robotics, mobile robotics, automatic path planning, artificial intelligence and machine vision. If you're someone who thrives in a fast-paced multidisciplinary environment and wants to see intelligent software driving large industrial robotics systems this is a position for you.




Qualifications

Master degree in Electrotechnical Engineering, Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Mechanical Engineering (Automation) or a related fields
Good understanding of robotics and automation systems.




Offer:




A permanent employment contract
Flexible working hours
Training
Health insurance,

Title: Python Fullstack Developer
HTML:
Decskill, founded in 2014 as an IT Consulting Company, places paramount importance on its greatest asset: its people. Our main mission is to deliver value through knowledge and talent, and we achieve this by fostering a culture of excellence and investing in the development and well-being of our people. With over 600 dedicated professionals and offices in Lisbon, Porto, Madrid, and Luxembourg, Decskill operates across three core areas:


Decskill Talent: We believe that our people are key to our success. Through Decskill Talent, we empower our team to embrace the digital transformation challenges of our clients. We collaborate with clients to drive innovation, ensuring project success and business growth.


Decskill Boost: Equipping our team with the latest tools and methodologies, we optimize Time-to-Market and deliver innovative solutions exceeding client expectations.


Decskill Connect: Our team collaborates closely with clients to implement and manage IT infrastructures that generate long-term value.


At Decskill, we believe that by nurturing and empowering our people to confront the challenges of digital transformation, we create value not only for our clients but also for our entire ecosystem, fostering a digital community dedicated to growth and progress.


We are looking for a Python Fullstack Developer for a hybrid project based in Porto (2x/Week).


Requirements:

  • Academic background in Engineering, Economics, Computing, Mathematics, Statistics or related fields;
  • 3+ years of Full-Stack development experience, end-to-end web application delivery;
  • Professional experience with Python Web Frameworks (Django, Flask, FastAPI).
  • Professional experience developing and maintaining data-centered APIs;
  • Work experience with Front-End frameworks (React, Angular);
  • Strong knowledge on Web UI and UX, with strong fundamentals (HTML, CSS, JS);
  • Strong knowledge on implementing authentication and directory services (SSO, LDAP);
  • Experience implementing RBAC models and User Management systems;
  • Knowledge on data analysis and data handling are a plus;
  • Knowledge on Plotly Dash is a plus;
  • Fluency in English (both written and spoken) is mandatory.


Responsibilities:

  • Develop, maintain and support modern, reactive and responsive Web Applications;
  • Develop, maintain and support custom APIs;
  • Develop and optimize solid backend solutions for both Web Applications and APIs, handling sometimes big volumes of data;
  • Integrate our interfaces with SSO systems;
  • Communicate with stakeholders and build the target Use Experience for our Web Applications; Communicate with stakeholders and achieve the desired outcome for our APIs
  • Develop, maintain and support RBAC and User Management models;
  • Understand and be the point of contact for the business and assess its needs;
  • Ensure that the target architecture meets business requirements;
  • Prioritize and manage multiple projects simultaneously, meeting deadlines and delivering high-quality results.


If you‚Äôre interested in this job please send your CV to goncalo.delgado@decskill.com with reference CN/FSP.


Decskill is committed to equality and non-discrimination with all our talents. We recruit and promote talent, based on diversity and inclusion, regardless of age, gender, ethnicity, race, nationality or any other form of discrimination incompatible with the dignity of the human being.

Title: Python Developer
Description:
Description

The role

Our client is an integrated, fully customisable platform that enables organisations to manage their freelance talent effectively and insightfully. Centralising freelancer availability in real-time, empowering hiring managers to onboard, book and pay talent with ease while ensuring compliance with local tax and labour laws.




Get the chance to work with broadcasters across the UK and help our client manage over 1000 bookings each month. The mission is to simplify freelancer management for every stakeholder.




About the Role

Work on a modern, scalable platform that handles booking management, client relationships, and analytics for freelance operations. As a Python Backend Developer on our AI-first development team, you'll architect scalable REST APIs and design complex database schemas that power our core platform. Our team leverages AI tools extensively for accelerated development, debugging, and optimisation.




How will you make an impact

Architect Scalable Solutions: Design and implement secure, efficient cloud solutions using Azure services to optimise infrastructure while enabling cloud-native app environments.
Drive Operational Excellence: Promote system reliability through continuous improvement with advanced observability and streamline CI/CD pipelines to accelerate delivery.
Collaborate to Innovate: Work within cross-functional teams to translate business requirements into cloud-first solutions that drive customer success.

What‚Äôs important to us

Strong background in software development, with solid understanding of various development tools and methodologies.
Experience with Azure services, including IaaS, networking, security, container orchestration (AKS), and serverless computing.
Azure certifications and familiarity with the Cloud Adoption Framework (CAF) are a plus.
Experience with automation technologies, such as IaC (e.g., Terraform) and CI/CD pipelines, with a good understanding of software engineering concepts and practices.
Curiosity to learn new technologies, passion for sharing knowledge, and a collaborative approach to problem-solving.







******Please only apply to this role if you are based in Ukraine******
